location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Collin Mactavish, Assistant Surgeon, in charge at Bushere [Bushire] to Captain Henry Hardy, Senior Officer Commanding the Squadron in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Captain Hardy that the accompanying letter (see f 80 2) conveys intelligence of the death of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, John Macleod, and Assistant Surgeon Edward Milward.The letter explains that the Resident, prior to his death, placed Mactavish in charge of the Bushire Residency pending future instructions from the Bombay Government.
